data.title: Feature films from other countries on Russian, Central European and East European subjects
data.meta_description: Index to the feature films by Western directors on Russian, Central European and East European subjects held by UCL SSEES Library.
data.text:
Index to the feature films by Western directors on Russian, Central European and East European subjects held by UCL SSEES Library.

The index also includes films made in other countries by Directors originally from Russia, Central Europe and Eastern Europe.

The Call numbers of the discs and tapes on which these films are held are given after the entries. Follow the link to retrieve full details.

German directors

Feature films by German directors are held in the Central and East European Feature Films Index.
